message: I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this valuable product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll find very appealing. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product.

I understand that you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get at least $11500 for the product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11500.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10500 for the product.

I understand you're trying to save some more money, but I'm not willing to go much lower. I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but that's as low as I can go. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand your concerns, but I'm still trying to save some money. I'm willing to pay $10800 for the product.
